title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-3.5 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-3.5 - Penalties

State Regulations
A violation of any provision of this Subpart is subject to all civil and criminal penalties as provided for by law. Individuals or entities that violate this Subpart are subject to a maximum fine of $1,000 for each violation; provided that individuals or entities who violate section
66-3.3
(a) or (b)
of this Subpart shall be subject to a maximum fine of $15,000 for each violation. For purposes of civil penalties, each day that there is a non-essential gathering or that an entity operates in a manner inconsistent with the Subpart shall constitute a separate violation under this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
66-3.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
